metadata.title: CVE-2021-3635 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel netfilter implementation in versionsprior to 5.5-rc7. A user with root (CAP_SYS_ADMIN) access is able to panicthe system when issuing netfilter netflow commands.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
